group_1.textRight: You have...quite the style.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, hi there!@Nice to meet you.

group_1.textRight: What the—? Oh, yes...@The pleasure is all mine.
Nice to meet you.
Anyway, your fighting style...
As a Magical Girl, I'm sorry to say I don't@much care for it.

group_1.textLeft: I beat that Witch, didn't I?@Isn't that enough?

group_1.textRight: It's far too crude.@You're only risking your life.
It worked this time, but it could also@cost you battles that you should win.
I do. And to top it all off...
...it was ugly.[chara:301000:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]
Well we are Magical Girls, after all.@We mustn't fight like savages.
We must be elegant and [chara:301000:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]graceful!
Hate to butt in, but when you@get really riled up, Senpai...
Your fighting style gets pretty ugly, too.
How dare you! How could...?!@M-me?! [chara:301000:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Ugly?!

group_1.textLeft: Hehe! You guys could totally go@on the road as a comedy[chara:303100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json] duo!

group_1.textRight: That is quite enough!
I am not one to joke.@I have much more important things to do.

group_1.textLeft: I get it, though.@It makes me mad, too.

group_1.textRight: Huh?@Mad at [chara:301000:motion_000]what?

group_1.textLeft: You get fed this line about @any wish you want coming true.
This perfect little vision gets dangled@in front of you, y'know?
But they don't tell you what @this—the trade-off—is really like.
That doesn't seem very fair, does it?

group_1.textRight: Oh, well... I see... I don't really—

group_1.textLeft: Exactly! So when I start feeling like@that, I go out and hunt some Witches!

group_1.textRight: And[chara:300900:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] that...helps?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, it's a great stress reliever!@Those Witches really help cheer me up!

group_1.textRight: I think something's wrong with your head…
Same.[chara:300900:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, look at the time.@[chara:303100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Gotta run! See you guys later!

group_1.textRight: Huh?@O-okay…
She just...tore through here like@a hurricane.
Yeah.

group_1.textCenter: Oh no! We've got a date on Saturday...
I still haven't picked a place for us@to go...
It's far too crude.@You're only risking your life.

group_1.narration: I don't know what else to do when I feel@like my heart is blowing around like dust@in the wind.
I can't talk to anyone about this, so that's@how I blow off steam.
I have to... Otherwise things will@just keep building up inside until...@I dunno, until my heart just explodes...
